title: So, Thor Is A Woman And Cap Is Black: Is This A Big Deal Or Not?
teaser: Marvel plans to make big changes to two of its iconic characters, announcing that Thor will be rewritten as a woman and that Captain America's identity will be assumed by an African-American. To learn more about the decisions, Audie Cornish speaks with Maggie Thompson, the former editor of Comics Buyers Guide.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
